parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Retrieve By
parameter.tooltip: How to retrieve the submission. Id or Query.

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form to query

parameter.label: Index
parameter.tooltip: The index to use for the search/retrieval

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: A query that will retrieve a single submission

parameter.label: Datastore Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being retrieved.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed. Should be one of Submission,Form,Kapp,Space

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed. Should be one of Space,Kapp,Form,Submission

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Start Context
parameter.tooltip: The lowest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed. Should be one of Submission,Form,Kapp,Space

parameter.label: End Context
parameter.tooltip: The highest level to search. If Submission, only a Submission Id is needed. Should be one of Space,Kapp,Form,Submission

parameter.label: Property To Find
parameter.tooltip: The Name of the Field/Attribute to search for a match.

parameter.label: Backup Value
parameter.tooltip: If no Field/Attribute value is returned, use this value

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the space to find attribute values in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the kapp to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the form to find attribute values in.

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission to find values in

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being created in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the datastore form the submission is for.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON map of submission field values.

parameters.parameter:
<%={
  "Task Run Id" => @run['Id'],
  "Delete After Date Time" => (Time.now + (86400 * (@results['Get Polling Artifact Cleanup Setting']['Value']).to_i)).iso8601
}.to_json%>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Table
parameter.tooltip: The name of the table to retrieve info from (ie. change_request,incident, task,etc).

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: The query to retrieve objects. Use a '^' to seperate parameters.

parameters.parameter:
<%= # Without replacement: # JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Integration Config']['Values JSON'])['Qualification']
# With replacement: # Parse query variable for {{Start Date}} and {{End Date}} and replace with calculated values.
extracted_times = JSON.parse(@results['Determine Start and End Times']['output']) query_start_time = Time.parse( extracted_times['query_start_time'] ) query_end_time = Time.parse( extracted_times['query_end_time'] ) formatted_start_date = "javascript:gs.dateGenerate('#{query_start_time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}','#{query_start_time.strftime("%H:%M:%S")}')" formatted_end_date = "javascript:gs.dateGenerate('#{query_end_time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}','#{query_end_time.strftime("%H:%M:%S")}')"
query = JSON.parse(@results['Retrieve Integration Config']['Values JSON'])['Qualification']
query.gsub!( "{{Start Date}}", formatted_start_date ) query.gsub!( "{{End Date}}", formatted_end_date )
query
%>

parameter.label: Display Value
parameter.tooltip: Return field display values (true), actual values (false), or both (all) (default: false).

parameter.label: Exclude Reference Link
parameter.tooltip: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false).

parameter.label: Suppress Pagination Header
parameter.tooltip: True to supress pagination header (default: false).

parameter.label: Fields
parameter.tooltip: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000).

parameter.label: Query Category
parameter.tooltip: Name of the query category (read replica category) to use for queries.

parameter.label: Source Data
parameter.tooltip: A JSON object of the ServiceNow ticket details

parameter.label: Integration Config Id
parameter.tooltip: The Submission Id of the Integration Config datastore submission

parameter.label: Integration Config Values
parameter.tooltip: A JSON object of the integration configuration values

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Table
parameter.tooltip: The name of the table to retrieve info from (ie. change_request,incident, task,etc).

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: The query to retrieve objects. Use a '^' to seperate parameters.

parameter.label: Display Value
parameter.tooltip: Return field display values (true), actual values (false), or both (all) (default: false).

parameter.label: Exclude Reference Link
parameter.tooltip: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false).

parameter.label: Suppress Pagination Header
parameter.tooltip: True to supress pagination header (default: false).

parameter.label: Fields
parameter.tooltip: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response.

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: The maximum number of results returned per page (default: 10,000).

parameter.label: Query Category
parameter.tooltip: Name of the query category (read replica category) to use for queries.
